messages.passwordWarning: "{0}" is your password. Giving your password out is not allowed! If your password is a commonly used word, please change it
messages.newsDialogNoteText: * New Pop Up Window will open. If it doesn't, just copy-paste the link in your browser
messages.kickOutBanned: A Chobots moderator has banned the account {0}
messages.buyStuff: After this purchase you’ll have {0} bugs. Continue purchase?
messages.buyStuffEmeralds: After this purchase you’ll have {0} emeralds. Continue purchase?
messages.emeraldsBought: Yay! You have grown rich. You get {0} emeralds.
messages.membershipFinishedText: All of your citizen belongings will stay with you! However, you will not be able to use them until you become a citizen again. Please ask your parents to renew your citizenship status
messages.removeFriendsConf: Are you sure you want to remove the selected friends?
messages.recycleWarning: Are you sure you want to remove this item and get {0} bugs?
messages.removeFriendConf: Are you sure you want to delete {0} from your friends list?
messages.idleTimeout: Connection lost. You have been idle for over 30 minutes.
messages.notAvailable: This token is not available at the moment.
messages.noMoreLeft: This token has already been claimed.
messages.alreadyClaimed: You have already claimed this token.
messages.membershipFinishingText: Check Citizenship expiration simply by clicking on the status button. All of your citizen stuff will stay with you! However, you will not be able to use them until you become a citizen again. Please ask your parents to prolong your citizenship status
messages.gameSafeModeOff: Chobots world goes into a full mode. You can use full chat and graffiti.
messages.gameSafeModeOn: Chobots world goes into a safe mode. Text chat and graffiti will not be available for couple of hours. You can play games and have fun with friends.
messages.safeModeTextChat: Chobots world is in a safe mode at the moment. You are not able to use the text chat and the graffiti.
messages.buyPaidStuffSMSChooseProviderText: Choose your mobile operator and press 'Next' button
messages.statusUpText: Citizens of Chobots world will have permission to: - buy special clothing - upgrade a house - buy pets - play full versions of academy games And this is not all, folks! Become a citizen soon!
messages.clickHereToStartTheGame: Click here to start the game
messages.tradeClickToTrade: Click on an item to add it to the trade list
messages.tradeClickToRemove: Click on an item to remove it from the trade list
messages.paidStuffBought: Congrats with an awesome item bought! Now you are one of the coolest Chobots.
messages.itemOfTheMonthMessage: Congratulations for becoming citizen. Here is your item of the month!
messages.membershipPresentDays: Congratulations! You have got {5} days of citizenship for: {6}. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.membershipPresentMonths: Congratulations! You have got {5} months of citizenship for: {6}. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.connectionErrorRedirect: There was a small problem with connecting. You will be redirected to Chobots homepage in a few seconds.
messages.citizenConfirmation: Do you want to become a citizen?
messages.kickUserConfirmation: Do you want to kick this user?
messages.warnUserConfirmation: Do you want to warn this user?
messages.drawingDisabledByMod: Your drawing has been disabled by a Chobots moderator
messages.pleaseEnterLogin: Fill in your name if you want to play
messages.newsDialogTopText: Find the latest Chobots News and Updates at our Official Blog!
messages.inviteFriendText1: Invite your friend and get bonus bugs – 7% from all bugs that your friend has earned! The more friends you invite, the more extra bugs you will gain!
messages.magicReady: Your magic is ready to be performed.
messages.guestStartup:
Message from administration# Dear guest,
Thanks for visiting Chobots world! Guests can play with other Chobots, but if you want to use full chat, receive presents and add friends, you should register.
Yours faithfully, the Chobots Team
messages.financeReportText:
Money you earned: {0} Bugs Money you spent: {1} Bugs
Money your invitees earned: {2} Bugs Your bonus: {3} Bugs Your Cho Energy: {4} Cho Your Level: {5}
messages.paidStuffBuyPaypalNextButtonText: New PayPal Window should open where you can pay with your credit card or PayPal account. If the window is not opened, make sure that your browser doesn't block pop-ups or go back and repeat the procedure
messages.tryMembershipMessage: Now you can check benefits of ‘Citizen’ status. This status will be active within {5} days. It will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipBought12: Now you have the status ‘Citizen’, that will be active within 12 months. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipBought3: Now you have the status ‘Citizen’, that will be active within 3 months. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipBought6: Now you have the status ‘Citizen’, that will be active within 6 months. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipBought: Now you have the status ‘Citizen’, that will be active within a month. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.monthMembershipBought1: Now you have the status ‘Citizen’, that will be active within a month. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4}
messages.connectionError: Connection error! Please clear your cache and try again.
messages.buyPaidStuffSMSNoProviderText: Please ask your parent to buy a premium suit for you Dear parent, to get the suit press 'Next' button
messages.buyPaidStuffText: Please ask your parent to buy a premium suit for you! Dear parent, to buy the suit, choose your country and follow further instructions
messages.paidStuffBuySendText: Please ask your parents to buy a premium suit for you! Dear parents, to buy the suit, you should send the SMS with the following text '{1}' (without inverted commas) to the number {0}. The cost of SMS is {2}{3}.s
messages.chatMLocked: Chat is disabled at this time
messages.adminMsg: Send an Emergency Message to Moderation
messages.inviteFriendText2: Simply ask your friend to put your chobot’s name on registration page!
messages.locationFull: Sorry, the city is full! Try entering the other city or become a citizen to be able to enter the full cities.
messages.locationForCitizensOnly: This location is for Chobots citizens only. Do you want to become one?
messages.standOnTheTeleport: Stand with your friends on the teleport than press this button to start the game
messages.paidStuffBuyPaypalText: The PayPal payment system web site will open. After payment is finished, your suit will appear in your wardrobe
messages.actionForCitizens: This action is available only for citizens. Do you want to become a citizen?
messages.actionForAgents: This location can only be accessed by agents.
messages.itemForCitizens: This item can only be purchased by Chobots citizens. Do you want to become a citizen?
messages.monthMembershipBuyText: To buy the status ‘Citizen’, you should send the SMS with the following text '{1}' (without inverted commas) to the number {0}. The cost of SMS is {2}{3}
messages.buyAccountText: To buy the ‘Citizen’ status, choose your country (and mobile operator if necessary) than press Next button
messages.monthMembershipExtendText: To extend your status Citizen for 1 month, you should send the SMS with the following text '{1}' (without inverted commas) to the number {0}. The cost of SMS is {2}{3}
messages.registerPlease: To play more games and chat with friends register at {0}
messages.tradeSuccessfull: Trade successful. Your new items have been sent to your wardrobe!
messages.waitingForOtherPlayers: Waiting for the rest of the players
messages.notActivatedStartup:
Welcome to Chobots world!# Now, you can play games, dress up and decorate your house. Amazing items are waiting for you in your wardrobe! But, if you want to use full chat, you should activate your account, and choose the proper option. The mail with information how to activate your account has been sent to you. If you haven’t received the mail – try to check your spam-box or to resend the mail.
Yours faithfully, Chobots Team
messages.updateFlashPlayer: Would you like Chobots to run it faster? Just install the latest flash player by going to {0}
messages.ignoreUserConfirm: Would you like to add this user to your ignore list?
messages.unIgnoreUserConfirm: Would you like to remove this user from your ignore list?
messages.stuffItemPresent: Yay! You have got an item from Chobots Team for: {0}.
messages.bugsBought: Yay! You have grown rich. You got {0} bugs.
messages.ignoreText: You are added to {0} ignore list
messages.cannotDeletePaidItem: You are not allowed to delete this item
messages.rules:
You are obliged to comply with the rules of Chobots! They are here for your own and others' safety and comfort. You cannot:
  • Exchange personal information such as emails or phone numbers Use inappropriate language Engage in romantic/sexual acts Harass other users Share links that are not related to Chobots Spam or Flood the room with useless messages
    • If you break these rules your chat will be disabled or you will be banned
messages.unignoreText: You are removed from {0} ignore list
messages.badWordWithIntervalHours: You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat for {1} hours. "{0}" is a bad word!
messages.badWordWithInterval: You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat for {1} minutes. "{0}" is a bad word!
messages.badWord: You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat from now on.
messages.skipWord: You are using not allowed words! {0} is not allowed word!
messages.youCanCloseThisIn: You may return to Chobots in {0} seconds.
messages.tradeCannotChangeItems: You cannot add or remove items after the trade has been accepted
messages.tradeCannotChangeNotConnected: You cannot add or remove items without your trade partner
messages.tradeCannotOpen2Windows: You cannot open more than one trade window at once

messages.magicNotReady1: You will be able to perform magic in {0} minute.

messages.bagIsFull: Your backpack is full! Sorry, but you can’t buy this.

messages.chatDisabledByAdminHours: Your chat was disabled by Chobots moderator. You can't use the full chat for {0} hours. Please, contact support for more information.
messages.chatDisabledByAdmin: Your chat was disabled by Chobots moderator. You can't use the full chat for {0} minutes. Please, contact support for more information.
